name: DuckDuckMaterial
description: This is a small companion script I made to fix some stuff in a theme I use based on DuckDuckGo's brand colors but using Material Design Pallete Colors.
additional_info: # Requirements 1. Roboto Mono and Roboto Slab fonts have to be installed on your PC 2. You have to adjust DuckDuckGo's Theme Settings first!! This style only applies tweaks on top of it. CLICK TO APPLY THEME SETTINGS IF THE THEME DOESN'T APPLY PROPERLY, CLICK TO SEE A SCREENSHOT TO MANUALLY ADJUST IT!
